document_data.name: Kendera Steeldice
document_data.mainbody:
'''Kendera Steeldice''' is a [[paladin]] of the [[Red Knight]], and the leader of the [[Gold Swords]] mercenary company.  Her group greatly aided the [[Mulhorand]]i conquest of [[Unther]].

{{stub-person}}
